name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Joel Michael FREED, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Joel Michael FREED, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Order of the Commonwealth Court, 48 Pa.Cmwlth. 178, 409 A.2d 1185, is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: James G. Kellar, Emil W. Kantra, II, Allentown, for appellant.
Harold H. Cramer, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 747
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Joel Michael FREED, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 29, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
James G. Kellar, Emil W. Kantra, II, Allentown, for appellant.
Harold H. Cramer, Asst. Atty. Gen., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
